channel.title: Help with the CFG and CLASS files
channel.description: Hey, i was wondering, you know how in the hybridscape file theres all those CLASS files and CFG files? Well li was wondering how to edit them, you know like the respawn time and stuff. Please help me[br][size=1]Posted at: November 11, 2006, 03:27:48 AM[/size][hr]PLZ POST AND HELP ME!!!!

item.title: Help with the CFG and CLASS files
item.dc:creator: @Superd00d Superd00d
item.description:
@Superd00d wrote:

[quote=“Kingen50cent, post:4, topic:24075”][quote author=Superd00d link=topic=36557.msg3083844#msg3083844 date=1262370160]
To edit them you have to open the item.cfg with notepad. All other cfg files work like that. And as for class, I’m sure you can’t edit them. You have to edit .class files through .java files. Look up more tutorials for coding specific things.
[/quote]
Oh! Sorry never noticed it was a 2 year old topic
I Guess you found your spade in a wrong time.[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: Help with the CFG and CLASS files

item.title: Help with the CFG and CLASS files
item.dc:creator: @Kingen50cent Kingen50cent
item.description:
@Kingen50cent wrote:

Superd00d:

To edit them you have to open the item.cfg with notepad. All other cfg files work like that. And as for class, I’m sure you can’t edit them. You have to edit .class files through .java files. Look up more tutorials for coding specific things.

I Guess you found your spade in a wrong time.

Read full topic
